analysis:
Entries in art and design subjects have decreased sharply across the UK over the last five years. The -87.1% change compared to a change of -86.0% in all AS-Level entries over the last five years. Over the same period, the 17-year-old population has changed by approximately -7.6%.

Across the UK, a broadly similar proportion of students achieved the top grades in art and design subjects in 2019 as did so across all AS-Level subjects. A total of 22.3% of pupils achieved A grades in art and design subjects compared to 21.5% for all subjects.
